prTitle: feat: implement Container component with responsive layout
prBody:
## Summary Implemented the Container component as specified in task #85, providing responsive layout constraints and horizontal centering for content. The component supports both constrained and full-width layouts via a `fluid` prop. ### Key Features - **Responsive max-widths**: Uses CSS custom properties for breakpoint-based constraints - **Fluid layout support**: Optional `fluid` prop removes max-width constraints - **CSS Custom Properties**: Leverages design system variables for spacing and breakpoints - **Horizontal centering**: Automatic centering using margin auto - **Extensible**: Supports custom className and spreads additional props - **Well-tested**: Comprehensive test suite covering all functionality ### Technical Details - **Component**: `src/components/ui/Container/Container.jsx` - **Styles**: `src/components/ui/Container/Container.module.css` - **Tests**: `src/components/ui/Container/__tests__/Container.test.jsx` - **Export**: `src/components/ui/Container/index.js` ### CSS Variables Used - `--spacing-*`: For responsive padding values - `--breakpoint-*`: For responsive breakpoints - `--container-*`: For max-width constraints at different breakpoints ### Responsive Behavior - **Mobile**: Full width with basic padding - **Tablet**: 720px max-width with increased padding - **Desktop**: 1200px max-width with larger padding - **Large Desktop**: 1240px max-width ### Usage ```jsx // Standard constrained container
Your content here
 // Full-width fluid container
Full-width content
 // With custom styling
Custom styled content
 ``` Closes #85
